item.title: Minesweeper Super Solver
item.dc:creator: @icedicicle icedicicle
item.description:
@icedicicle wrote:

Originally posted over in the first scripts section.
Record time of two seconds on beginner!

[code]//Minesweeper Solver version Alpha (My First Script!)
//by icedicicle
//Setup lines: 9-17 (solver optimised to work at default settings)
//Emergency Temination Key: press and hold â€˜qâ€™
//Emergency Restart Key: press and hold â€˜râ€™

program New;

//Grid Size (Beginner = 99, Intermediate = 1616)
const GridX = 9;
const GridY = 9;
//Retry Attempts
const Retry = 10;
//Failed Pass Tolerance (A low number will cause the solver to give up easily)
const FailTolerance = 10;
//Mouse Move (True = nicer but slower; False = faster)
const MouseShow = false;

//Variables
var x,y,sx,sy,value,svalue,i,ux,uy,flimit,rlimit: Integer;

//Variables: Bitmap
var Dead,CubeOff,CubeOn,Press: Integer;
var Three,Seven,Eight,Impress,Flag,Smiley,Won: Integer;

//Function: FindEmpty
Function FindEmpty(): Boolean;
begin
result := false;
If(FindBitmapIn(CubeOn,x,y,15,102,159,246))Then
result := true
else
result := false;
end;

//Function: FindValue
Function FindValue(a,b:Integer): Integer;
begin
If(FindBitmapIn(CubeOn,x,y,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 0
else if(FindBitmapIn(Impress,x,y,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 0
else if(FindBitmapIn(Flag,x,y,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 0
else if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 1
else if(FindColor(x,y,32768,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 2
else if(FindBitmapIn(Three,x,y,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 3
else if(FindColor(x,y,8388608,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 4
else if(FindColor(x,y,128,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 5
else if(FindColor(x,y,8421376,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 6
else if(FindColor(x,y,0,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 7
else if(FindBitmapIn(Eight,x,y,a,b,a+15,b+15))Then
result := 8;
end;

//Function: GameOver
Function GameOver(): Boolean;
begin
result := false;
If(FindBitmap(Dead,x,y))Then
result := true
else
result := false;
end;

//Function: GameWon
Function GameWon(): Boolean;
begin
result := false;
If(FindBitmap(Won,x,y))Then
result := true
else
result := false;
end;

//Function: GetSurround
Function GetSurround(a,b:Integer): Integer;
begin
result := 0
If(FindBitmapIn(Impress,x,y,a-16,b-16,a-1,b-1))Then
result := result+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Impress,x,y,a,b-16,a+15,b-1))Then
result := result+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Impress,x,y,a+16,b-16,a+31,b-1))Then
result := result+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Impress,x,y,a-16,b,a-1,b+15))Then
result := result+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Impress,x,y,a+16,b,a+31,b+15))Then
result := result+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Impress,x,y,a-16,b+16,a-1,b+31))Then
result := result+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Impress,x,y,a,b+16,a+15,b+31))Then
result := result+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Impress,x,y,a+16,b+16,a+31,b+31))Then
result := result+1;
end;

//Function: Clear
Function Clear(a,b:Integer): Boolean;
var cvalue: Integer;
begin
cvalue := 0
If(FindBitmapIn(Flag,x,y,a-16,b-16,a-1,b-1)=true)Then
cvalue := cvalue+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Flag,x,y,a,b-16,a+15,b-1)=true)Then
cvalue := cvalue+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Flag,x,y,a+16,b-16,a+31,b-1)=true)Then
cvalue := cvalue+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Flag,x,y,a-16,b,a-1,b+15)=true)Then
cvalue := cvalue+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Flag,x,y,a+16,b,a+31,b+15)=true)Then
cvalue := cvalue+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Flag,x,y,a-16,b+16,a-1,b+31)=true)Then
cvalue := cvalue+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Flag,x,y,a,b+16,a+15,b+31)=true)Then
cvalue := cvalue+1;
If(FindBitmapIn(Flag,x,y,a+16,b+16,a+31,b+31)=true)Then
cvalue := cvalue+1;
If(cvalue = value)Then
result := true
Else if(cvalue > value)Then
result := true
Else
result := false;
end;

//Function: Fail
Function Fail(): Boolean;
begin
If(flimit = FailTolerance)Then
begin
result := true;
writeln(â€™----------------------Gave upâ€™);
writeln(â€™----------------------Set higher fail toleranceâ€™);
end
Else
result := false;
end;

//Procedure: ClickBlind
procedure ClickBlind(a,b:Integer);
begin
ClickMouse(a-7,b-7,true);
ClickMouse(a-7,b,true);
ClickMouse(a-7,b+21,true);
ClickMouse(a+7,b-7,true);
ClickMouse(a+7,b+21,true);
ClickMouse(a+21,b-7,true);
ClickMouse(a+21,b,true);
ClickMouse(a+21,b+21,true);
end;

//Procedure: ClickSurround
procedure ClickSurround(a,b:Integer;left:Boolean);
var cx,cy: Integer;
begin
For i := 1 to value do
begin
cx := 0;
cy := 0;
FindBitmapIn(Impress,cx,cy,a-16,b-16,a+31,b+31);
If(FindBitmapIn(Flag,ux,uy,cx-12,cy+2,cx-1,cy+13)=false)Then
begin
ClickMouse(cx-8,cy+8,left);
writeln(â€™----------------------Mine found, flaggingâ€™);
end;
end;
end;

begin
//Bitmaps
Dead := BitmapFromString(15, 15, â€˜z78DA3330C007DC800037492Aâ€™ +
â€˜C06F1A79B69067267EF3316531D9C4ABC1EF5AE2C3993C714AD48â€™ +
â€˜C92F449A5B44B1BF8D333F1FE223EBF0C9E3C4EDDD2093F0000EBâ€™ +
â€˜743380â€™);
CubeOff := BitmapFromString(16, 16, â€˜z78DA7373A31570360041Dâ€™ +
â€˜A996C018698E294430B24386AFEA8F9A3E68F9A8FDF7C4C716A41â€™ +
â€˜DA990C8100BB4161ECâ€™);
CubeOn := BitmapFromString(16, 16, â€˜z78DAB330B0A00374A6191Câ€™ +
â€˜357FD4FC51F347CD1F359F3C080042745511â€™);
Press := BitmapFromString(2, 2, â€˜808080808080808080C0C0â€™ +
â€˜C0â€™);
Three := BitmapFromString(1, 10, â€˜z78DA73733300023730E94C04â€™ +
â€˜7443520F00972D0D47â€™);
Seven := BitmapFromString(10, 10, â€˜z78DA33301818E04C34A4BFDâ€™ +
â€˜E511B29D70B0016207CF9â€™);
Eight := BitmapFromString(1, 8, â€˜z78DA73367006420B0CE88C049â€™ +
â€˜1C501FA440A24â€™);
Impress := BitmapFromString(2, 3, â€˜z78DA73734307CE060868018â€™ +
â€˜600ADB808D7â€™);
Flag := BitmapFromString(4, 5, â€˜z78DA333040003737EA930638CCâ€™ +
â€˜0700F9C31941â€™);
Smiley := BitmapFromString(15, 15, â€˜z78DA3330C007DC80003749â€™ +
â€˜2AC06F1A79B69067267EF329371397F9B490A585BDA324F1314BBâ€™ +
â€˜97AF2E29718BDC4A710E273017DF220ADCB0DEA967500ABC83430â€™);
Won := BitmapFromString(15, 15, â€˜z78DA3330C007DC800037492ACâ€™ +
â€˜06F1A79B69067267EF329371397F994841E2E13480D2B52C39318â€™ +
â€˜BDC4CBE272B9051012E7120880A8C71F1A43852426E4C9D38BDF0â€™ +
â€˜4F272167DF220ADCB0DEA96750083812B08â€™);

//Start
ActivateClient;
writeln(â€™----------------------Minesweeper initiatedâ€™);
rlimit := 1;
repeat
If(FindBitmap(Smiley,x,y))Then
begin
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
Wait(100);
end
Else if(FindBitmap(Dead,x,y))Then
begin
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
Wait(100);
end;
sx := 15;
sy := 102;
writeln(â€™----------------------Run: '+Inttostr(rlimit));

//Empty Finder
While(GameOver()=false)and(FindEmpty()=false)Do
begin
wait(50);
ClickMouse(15+random(144),102+random(144),true);
end;

//Cube AI
repeat
value := FindValue(sx,sy);
svalue := GetSurround(sx,sy);
writeln(â€˜Value: â€˜+Inttostr(value)+â€™ Unclicked: â€˜+Inttostr(svalue));
If(MouseShow = true)Then
MoveMouse(sx+8,sy+8);
If(sx > GridX16+14)Then
begin
sy := sy+16;
sx := 15;
writeln(â€™----------------------Row clearedâ€™);
end
else if(sy > GridY16+101)Then
begin
sy := 102;
sx := 15;
writeln(â€™----------------------Restarting from topâ€™);
flimit := flimit+1;
end
else if(value = 0)Then
sx := sx+16
else if(value > 0)Then
begin
If(svalue = value)or(svalue < value)Then
begin
ClickSurround(sx,sy,false);
If(Clear(sx,sy)=true)Then
begin
writeln(â€™----------------------Cube cleared.â€™);
ClickBlind(sx,sy);
end;
sx := sx+16;
end
else if(svalue > value)Then
begin
If(Clear(sx,sy)=true)Then
begin
writeln(â€™----------------------Cube cleared.â€™);
ClickBlind(sx,sy);
end;
sx := sx+16
end;
end;
value := 0;
svalue := 0;
until(GameOver()=true)or(Fail()=true)or(IsKeyDown(â€˜qâ€™))or(IsKeyDown(â€˜râ€™))or(GameWon()=true)
writeln(â€™----------------------Game Overâ€™);
rlimit := rlimit+1;
flimit := 0;
until(rlimit=Retry)or(rlimit>Retry)or(IsKeyDown(â€˜qâ€™))or(GameWon()=true)
writeln(â€™----------------------Minesweeper Terminatedâ€™);
end.[/code]

Hope you guys like it.
Random clicking when unsolvable and support for intermediate and expert in the next version!

Read full topic
